group_1.textCenter: My oh my, I don't often get customers here.
I wonder, why in the world did you come here?
This isn't actually a chocolate shop, you realize.
I only deal in the ingredients for making chocolate.
And what I have here is a bit special...
If you came here without knowing anything,@take a look around...
If you're curious, I'll let you take a peek...
Look at all of the baking chocolate@lined up on the shelves.
Soon you'll begin to realize@the wonder of this cocoa.

group_1.narration: After all, within our baking chocolate@lies all of the possibilities that each girl@possesses on Valentine's Day.
Sweet and bitter all mixed together,@possibilities that could have happened,@possibilities that may yet happen...
If you were planning to take some home with you,@I'd advise you to first inspect them one by one.

group_1.textCenter: Can you see the possibilities in@this child's Valentine's Day...?
